title: Sitting pretty: how to paint a portrait
creator_credit: Bell and Howell and Randolph Coats
brief_description: A dynamic and colorful demonstration of painting a portrait by one of America’s most popular portrait artists, Randolph Coats. A model is posed in various different lightings, before the artist decides on the one which suits his purpose best; then the process of painting a portrait is followed step by step to its completion.
